title: Kevin Hart Interview and more
itunes:title: Kevin Hart Interview and more
description:
Today on the show we had friend to the show Kevin Hart call in where he spoke about his new stand up "Zero F** Given", how he's been living through the pandemic, and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Giant Food Market for terrible marketing for Thanksgiving ad and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee" with one caller doing some counseling to a couple.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
